summary:
Now the material of your armors is very important.
You have extra bonus depending on their material,so Daedric armor isn\'t entirely stronger than Steel armor!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=9][color=Mediumorchid]Material  Master[/color][/size][/font]

[b][color=Mediumspringgreen][size=5][u]There are 3 main files,read small description and select files you need.[/u][/size][/color][/b]

[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Powderblue][b]-Description-[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[FONT=Times New Roman][size=4]There are various armors in Skyrim.
But in vanilla Skyrim,Steel armor is entirely weaker than Dwarven,and Dwarven weaker than Orcish...
It\'s so dull!

[b]Now each smithing perks give you unique effects [color=Orangered][u]depending on the material of your armors![/u][/color][/b]
Ex) \"Steel Smithing\" perk gives you iron and steel armor effects.
 
And they require that the material of your [u][b][color=Cadetblue]Cuirass, Gauntlets, Boots[/color][/b][/u] is same.
Ex) You can get \"Iron Armor Effect\" only when you wear iron armor,iron gauntlets,and iron boots.

[i]Now,[color=Lawngreen]it\'s important that you wear [u]same material armors[/u]![/color][/i]
[/size][/font]

[font=Arial Black][size=5][b][color=cyan]--Effects list--[/color][/b][/size][/font]

[FONT=Times New Roman][size=5][i][u][color=Mistyrose]-Steel Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) [color=Indianred]If The material of worn armors is Iron[/color]
    [color=Cadetblue]Your smithing,block,two-handed,one-handed,heavy armor skill increases 10% faster![/color]

(2) [color=Gray]If The material of worn armors is Steel[/color] and [color=Cadetblue]your smithing skill is higher than 60[/color]
    [color=Darkorange]Your armor rating increases 20% higher![/color]

(3) [color=Gray]If Worn armors are Imperial[/color]
    [color=Goldenrod]You can buy anything 15% cheaper[/color],and [color=Teal]damages to Stormcloak Soldiers increase by 40%![/color]

(4) [color=Teal]If Worn armors are Stormcloak[/color]
    Your [color=Powderblue]Frost Resistance increases by 20%[/color],and [color=Gray]damages to Imperial increase by 40%![/color]

(5) [color=Rosybrown]If Worn armors are Blades[/color]
    [color=Turquoise]All shouts damaging you weaken by 30%[/color],and [color=Coral]One-handed sword damages[/color] to [color=Crimson]Dragons increase by 25%![/color]

(6) [color=Violet]If Worn armors are Dawnguard[/color]
    [color=Darkorchid]Weapon damages to Vampires increase by 20%![/color]
    And more,[color=Lightpink]If Restoration skill is higher than 50[/color]
    [color=Silver]Weapon attacks to Undeads[/color] [color=Red]burn them![/color][/size]


[size=5][i][u][color=Wheat]-Elven Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) [color=Wheat]If The material of worn armos is Elven[/color]
    [color=Yellow]Spell costs of Destruction and Alteration decrease by 15%!  [/color]
    And more,If [color=Wheat]equipped weapon is Elven[/color] and your [color=Cyan]Magicka is higher than 150[/color]
    [color=Deepskyblue]Extra 30 points Magicka damages to your enemy on every atack![/color]

(2) [color=Palegreen]If worn armors are made by Falmer[/color]
    [color=Mediumorchid]Your poison resist increases by 100%![/color]
    And more,If [color=Palegreen]equipped weapons are made by Falmer[/color],and [color=Yellowgreen]Alchemy skill is higher than 50[/color]
    [color=Mediumorchid]Your weapons have poison constantly! [/color][/size]


[size=5][i][u][color=Goldenrod]-Dwarven Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4]    [color=Goldenrod]If The material of worn armors, equipped weapon is Dwarven[/color]
    [color=Greenyellow]Stamina consumption of power atack decreases by 50%![/color]
    And more,If [color=Green]your Heavy armor skill is higher than 60[/color]
   [color=Greenyellow] Power attack is stronger by 30%![/color][/size]


[size=5][i][u][color=Mediumseagreen]-Glass Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) [color=Mediumseagreen]If The material of worn armors is Glass[/color] and [color=coral]your Light Armor skill is higher than 65[/color]
    [color=Lightskyblue ]Weapon swinging speed increases by 30%![/color][/size]

[size=4](2) [color=Mediumseagreen]If The material of worn armors is Glass[/color] and [color=Darkorange]your Alteration skill is higher than 60[/color],and [color=Cyan]your Magicka higher than 250[/color]
    [color=Cyan]All spells damaging you is weaker by 20%![/color][/size]


[size=5][i][u][color=Green]-Orcish Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) [color=Green]If The material of worn armors is Orcish[/color] and [color=Mediumseagreen]Heavy Armor skill is higher than 50[/color]
    [color=Gainsboro]Damages from daggers,swords,greatswords decrease by 30%![/color]

(2) [color=Green]If The material of worn armors,and equipped shield is Orcish[/color]
   [color=Crimson] Bashing shield occurs paralysis to your enemy in 2 seconds randomly![/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Chocolate]-Advanced Armor-[/color][/u][/i][/size]

[size=4](1)[color=Chocolate] If The material of worn armors is Scale [/color]
   [color=Burlywood]Your fallen damage become 0! [/color]
   And more,[color=coral]If your Light Armor skill is higher than 50[/color]
    [color=Antiquewhite]Damages from animals decrease by 50%![/color]

(2)[color=Gray] If The material of worn armors is Steel Plate[/color]
    You get [color=Azure]25% resists[/color] against [color=red]fire[/color] and[color=Skyblue] frost![/color]
  [color=Yellow]But shock damages increase by 25%![/color]

(3) [color=Sienna]If The material of worn armors is Leather[/color],and Light Armor skill is higher than 60
   [color=Darkcyan] Your sneaking power increases by 50%![/color]

(4)[color=Indianred] If The material of worn armors is Hide[/color],and [color=Coral]Archery skill is higher than 60[/color]
   [color=Coral] Your bow damage increases by 30%![/color]

(5)[color=Lightsalmon] If The material of worn armors is Studded[/color]
    [color=Palegoldenrod]Damages from Mace and Warhammer decrease by 40%![/color]

(6) [color=Saddlebrown]If The material of worn armors is Forsworn[/color]
    [color=Lightpink]Wild animals become unaggresive to you![/color]

(7) [color=Sienna]If The material of worn armors is Thieves Guild[/color]
    [color=Olivedrab]Max carry wight increases by 30%[/color],and [color=cyan]you move faster by 30%![/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Mediumorchid]-Ebony Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4][color=Mediumorchid] If The material of worn armors, equipped weapon is Ebony[/color] and [color=Indianred]One-Handed, Two-Handed, Archery skill are higher than 50[/color][/size]
 [size=4][color=Orange] Weapon critical chance is higher by 30%![/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Deeppink]-Daedric Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4][color=Deeppink] If The material of worn armors is Daedric [/color]
[color=red] Destruction spell damage[/color] [color=Burlywood]against humans increases by 30%![/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Orangered]-Dragon Smithing-[/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) [color=Orangered]If The material of worn armors is Dragon Plate[/color]
   [color=Khaki] All damages from Dragons decreases by 20%![/color]

(2)[color=Salmon] If The material of worn armors is Dragon Scale[/color]
    [color=Skyblue]Shout recharging time decreases by 30%![/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Orchid]-Arcane Blacksmith- [/color][/u][/i][/size]
[size=4](1) In combat,[color=plum]the amount of soul gem recharging increases by 30%![/color]

(2) [color=Darkorchid]If worn armors are made by Vampires[/color]
    [color=Lavender]Frost Resistance increases by 30%[/color],but [color=Red]Fire Resistance decreases by 30%![/color]
    And more,[color=Fuchsia],Extra Damages ignoring armor to enemies[/color] [color=Dodgerblue][b][u]only during a Night![/u][/b][/color][/size]

[size=5][i][u][color=Turquoise]-Dragonborn Armors- [/color][/u][/i][/size]


[size=4](1) [color=Chocolate]If The material of worn armos is Chitin[/color]
    [color=Darkgoldenrod]Allow you to zoom bows[/color],and [color=Palegreen]stagger chance increases by 30%! [/color]

(2) [color=Darkorange]If The material of worn armors is Bonemold[/color]
    [color=Indianred]Arrows and Bolts damages decrease by 30%[/color],and [color=Red]Fire Resistance increases by 25%![/color]

(3) [color=Aquamarine]If The material of worn armors is Stalhrim[/color]
    Your [color=Seashell]Frost Attacks strengthen by 40%,and Frost Resistance increases by 30%![/color]
    [color=Olive]But Damages from Mace and Worhammer increase by 20%![/color]

(4) [color=Slategray]If worn armors are Carved Nordic[/color]
    [color=Orchid]Damages from arrows and daggers decrease by 20%![/color]
    And more,[color=Slategray]equipped weapon is Nordic[/color],and [color=Green]Heavy Armor skill is higher than 60[/color]
   Weapon Attacks cause [color=Fuchsia]bleeding![/color][/size][/font]

[font=Arial Black][size=5][b][color=cyan]--Compatible--[/color][/b][/size][/font]

[FONT=Times New Roman][size=4][b]This is compatible with Perk mods [u]which doesn\'t change smithing perks themselves.[/u][/b]
So compatible with most of perk mods! [/size]

[size=6][i][color=Chartreuse]Let\'s become a Material Master![/color][/i][/size][/font]
author: metametroid

files.name: Material Master -Dragonborn Edition-
files.changelogHtml:
Added Thives Guild effect
Removed "Dragonborn+Dawnguard edition".now it isn't needed.
